insert into t_trade_account_settlement (userId, accountId, dealId, tradeTime, stockId, stockCode, currency, direction, tradeAmount, tradeVolume, tradePrice, taxes, commission, status, createTime) values (#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{accountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dealId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tradeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{stockId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{stockCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{direction,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{tradeAmount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tradeVolume,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tradePrice,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{taxes,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{commission,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
